PIF Options

These can all be selected from the Interfaces page of the Xplorer Configuration Editor.

  1. Count of PIF Write Buffer Entries
  2. Prioritize Loads Before Stores
  3. Inbound PIF Request Buffer Depth
  4. PIF Write Responses option
    Enable PIF Write Responses. If enabled, a "Write Error" interrupt may be configured
  5. PIF Request Attributes option
  6. PIF Critical Word First option
    Enable loading of critical word first on a block request
  7. PIF Arbitrary Byte Enable option
  8. Early Restart option
    Enable Early Restart as soon as the critical word has been filled to a cache-line
Parent topic: Interface Options
Previous topic: Bus and Bridge Selections
Next topic: Prefetch Options
